title: Make planned-moment pill cards slimmer and more elongated

requirements.text: Adjust the planned-moment pill card styling so the card appears significantly narrower (reduced height/thickness) and more elongated horizontally, while preserving the existing border-only pill look, left color dot, and right-side action icons. Implement this by updating the CSS for the planned-moment card classes used by `frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentCard.tsx` (e.g., `.planned-moment-card-clear`, `.planned-moment-card-color-dot`, and related action/icon sizing/spacing) in `frontend/src/index.css`.

quotes: make the card pill way more narrower and then longer..

acceptanceCriteria: Planned-moment cards render with noticeably less vertical thickness than before (reduced overall height).
Cards read as more elongated capsules (higher width-to-height ratio) without changing the overall layout structure (left dot, center text stack, right stacked icons).
No regressions to functionality: share and delete actions still work, and text remains readable/truncated appropriately (no overflow outside the pill).
The pill remains border-only with transparent interior and border color still matches `moment.color`.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep the card border-only/transparent style and continue using `moment.color` for the border color via `--card-border-color`.
nonGoals: No changes to planned-moment data models, storage, or backend APIs.
No redesign of icon set or card content layout beyond size/spacing adjustments needed to achieve a slimmer/longer pill.
